Tender Title :: Construction of Balance work of 317.50 meter span pre-stressed concrete bridge at Bagchhal over Govind Sagar Reservoir in Distt Bilaspur (HP)
Title: Construction of Balance work of 317.50 meter span pre-stressed concrete bridge at Bagchhal over Govind Sagar Reservoir in Distt Bilaspur (HP)
Work Description: Road widening at RD 9/0 to 10/810 on Swarghat side approach of Bagchhal Bridge, P/L Granluar Sub Base, WMM, DBM, 40mm thick BC on both side approaches of Bagchhal Bridge, Provision of R/wall, B/wall Parapets, U-shape drain on both side approaches
Bid Opening Place: EE Bilaspur Division No. 2 HPPWD Bilaspur

Address: EE Bilaspur Division No. 2 HPPWD Bilaspur
